name: Gnomes Garden
description: Dry summer withered the king’s beloved garden and the surrounding gardens of the kingdom alike. The ruler has fallen ill and the kingdom is in danger. Help the princess save the gardens and make the king better again.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32/64 bit Processor: Intel Atom N455 (1660 MHz) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel GMA 3150 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: With these gnomes I'll know my garden will be nice.

It is very easy to beat the missions within the 3 star time. There isn't much of a story; you are restoring the king's garden. I got the game in a bundle and didn't pay much for it. It didn't require as much strategy as other games like this I have played. I still enjoyed going through all of the missions.
